dataJson.description: A project built for freecodecamp.com in 2016, the requirement then were to build a request header parser
dataJson.name: Request Header Parser Microservice
dataJson.story: After all those projects I wanted something simpler, so I took a backend project. It looked so simple that I decided to build it in Python using Flask. It was easy to make and easy to deploy to heroku.

techs.description: A programming language mostly used for scripting and data
techs.name: Python
